text:
e="preserve">Olatz Fernández de Arroyabe (born 18 March 1970) is a Spanish rugby union player. She played the position of third wing line (n ° 6 or 7) for the club of Getxo RT, and for the Spain national rugby team.
In 2004, she was part of the team that toured South Africa. She played at the 1998 Women's Rugby World Cup, 2002 Women's Rugby World Cup, and 2006 Women's Rugby World Cup. She participated in the Six Nations Women's Tournament.
